comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; MAAR)

Steps to reproduce:

Double click in the uppermost far left to close firefox.


Actual results:

Does not close


Expected results:

In Windows, a menu appears or double-clicking exits program.
comments.author: xclcbz@gmail.com

comments.author: fmdevelopertim@gmail.com
comments.text:
Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode? http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode

How about with a new, empty profile? http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Basic%20Troubleshooting#w_8-make-a-new-profile

WFM - Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110903 Firefox/9.0a1 ID:20110903030832
